features: Mini Paper Stationery Set: you will receive 50 pieces of floral stationery paper and envelopes letter sets, including 50 pieces of letter writing papers, 50 matching envelopes with 60 dot stickers; The sufficient quantity and rich design can meet your writing and sending needs
Reliable to Write: flower designs double sided for writing poem letters adopt quality paper material, smooth and reliable, conducive to your writing, no blurring, serving you for a long time

Notable Size Details: each sheet of writing lined paper measures about 5.5 x 8.25 inches/ 14 x 21 cm, and the letter envelope is about 4.3 x 5.8 inches/ 11 x 14.6 cm; The writing paper should fit in the envelope in a right size

Diverse Designs: floral stationery paper and envelope sets come in 10 different styles that are beautiful and meaningful, and the designs include yellow sunflower, pink rose, green palm leaves, blue hydrangea, purple rose, and more, to make your letter more attractive, you can choose different styles to write to friends according to your own preferences

Wide Applications: the floral paper stationery set is suitable for wedding invitations, themed party invitations, sheet music, anniversaries, birthdays, baby and bridal showers, graduation letters, thank you notes, and more, you'll love using them to design your arts and crafts and impress others
body.description: Features: Round dot stickers: The floral round dot stickers are applied to enclose and decorate envelopes, and you can have a random choice from these flower patterned stickers to create a styled letter envelope for sending. Utility gift ideas: This letter paper and envelopes set is feasible to be sent as a gift to your friends, colleagues, classmates, children, parents, students, and others, making them feel your sincere care, and considerate thoughtfulness. Specifications: Material: paper Color: as pictures shown Size: Paper: approx. 5.5 x 8.25 inches/ 14 x 21 cm Envelope: approx. 4.3 x 5.8 inches/ 11 x 14.6 cm Dot sticker: approx. 1.18 inches/ 3 cm in diameter Package includes: 50 x Stationery writing papers 50 x Envelopes 60 x Round stickers Warm notes: Please note the size detail information before ordering. Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The color may exist a slight difference due to different screen displays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This set is so much prettier in person! The colors are lovely, good quality and so cute! The adhesive on the stickers isn’t bad like other reviews mention. I’m still using extra glue or tape to seal my envelopes. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely Design and Good Value
reviews.reviewText: The sheets of writing paper are just thick enough for ink not to bleed through if you want to write on both sides. The envelopes seem thicker than the sheets. The 10 designs are beautifully elegant and each has a sticker, envelope and sheet of paper to match. The presentation is not ideal for a gift, because the pack came in a plastic sheath with a zippered top, but the contents are perfect for my intended use and they arrived in pristine condition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable for pen-pals
reviews.reviewText: My daughter and her best friend have started sending each other letters on this stationary that i got them for Christmas. They think it's so fun to receive mail, and they get to practice their writing skills! (1st grade).A little thin, but perfect for what it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very good stationary for the price point!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. So, I took a chance to buy something with basically no reviews, but it was worth it!Buyers should be aware of 2 things- 1) these envelopes do not have any self sealing feature (not that gross lickable glue stuff, nor a built in sticker on the inside of the envelope) but, they do come with the lovely stickers that match each set. 3 sheets of stickers. I tried out one of the stickers and I do think it could be stronger, but it wasn't useless. To be on the safe side, if you are going to actually mail these envelopes through the postal system, I would put a bit of tape on the envelopes instead of relying solely on the sticker. It would be nice if the seller would give the buyer a heads up that the envelopes aren't self sealing, but it doesn't bother me personally.2nd- the colors of stationary I got are just a little bit different than what's in the photo online, the Amazon photos are very vivid, almost shocking colors on some. But, if you read the details in the description of the product, the seller says clearly there may be slight color differences. The set I've received is slightly more pastel colored, but they are beautiful all the same, and I intend to keep this stationary.The paper is lined on both sides and a bit thin but not bad. Use writing utensils that won't bleed through. The envelopes are made of thicker paper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my daughter for Christmas and loved it! The paper isn't too thin, the colors are vibrant, and she loves that the envelopes are colored as well. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was purchased as a gift. I was happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewerName: Tammy. I found the necklace. It wasn’t in the box but in the bag.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023

reviews.reviewText: The stickers for this one are pretty unnecessary and I will not be using them.... they look "tacky". The stationary is very light and thin but the pattern to make them look old is a little off and dark in places. Not sure if I like it or not.

I was very happy when this paper arrived as it was much prettier than the picture showed and the picture was very pretty! The paper matches well with the envelopes and I'm very proud to have it to use to write to my many pen pals! The only downside is that there are only 50 sheets of paper to go with the fifty envelopes! I tend to do longer letters so I'll use two sheets of paper per envelope! This did not come as a surprise as I read about the paper before ordering it but I liked the paper so much that I ordered it anyway! The 25 extra envelopes will still get used as they are too lovely not to be! I'll order again when ready!
The product was only fair,the price was what it was but the product was only average,next time I would spend a little more and get better quality
